topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d2cbf7636872326f290600#post_54d2cbf7636872326f290600
Cause people in general like pretty looking characters; it goes for both sexes really.

To use an analogy you know how certain people go "oh well only men play good looking female characters" to put it in a nicer way.  Nuh-uh; that's straight up horseshit; both sexes think pretty female characters are awesome.

The reason why it's relevant is that if you have guys creating drawings of pretty female characters and women creating drawings of pretty female characters there's going to be considerably more female characters drawn for personification.

My response for the next two years to anyone that thinks you can slack off with a full time advertising job AND going to college full time for video game design and piss away your time reading manga my response is going to be a blanket "FUCK OFF!"
